page_title: Master in Renewable Energy in the Marine Environment – The Master in Renewable Energy in the Marine Environment (REM+ 2) is an Erasmus Mundus Joint Master Degree (EMJMD) offered by four universities and supported by more than 40 associate centres and partners

content.title: International master
content.description: This Erasmus Mundus Joint Master Degree is co-funded by the Erasmus+ Programme of the European Union and takes place in four universities in Spain, Ireland, France and Italy.

content.title: In-company MSc thesis
content.description: Students can choose to develop their MSc thesis in one of the companies supporting the master. This presents a great oppotunity to gain experience while working on the thesis.
